description: Variation of Condition Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 21/03278/FUL (Erection of two storey side and rear extension to create 1no. three-bedroom dwelling.) to allow changes in roof structure.
decision_conditions: The substantial demolition of the building is new development which falls outside the scope of the original description of development and the description of development cannot be amended under Section 73 of The Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
